reviewText: Great vhs all about family & friendship oh & the best little bill vhs ever made !
Little Bill - Me and My Family is about a very loving family and sets a very example for kids and adults alike. , We love it.
My granddaughter just loved this. The little bill series is really great for all kids, not just African American children

Purchased for my daughter who was 2 1/2 years old at the time.  She absolutely loves Little Bill and this tape did not let her (or me) down.  I would recommend it to anyone who wants to remind their children the importance of family value.
This video is so cute and my son loves it.  I love the focus on family and how they encourage Little Bill to be hopeful and unafraid.  I would love to see the Little Bill videos come out on DVD!
